SQL.statement: CREATE TABLE TD41 (C1 INT not null, C2 blob, C3 clob) in TS4
alter table TD41 add constraint TD41_C unique(C1)
CREATE TABLE TD42 (C1 INT not null, C2 VARCHAR(2000), C3 VARCHAR(2000)) in TS4
alter table TD42 add constraint TD42_C unique(C1)

alter table TD43 add constraint TD43_C unique(C1)
